events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and will begin the review process shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering due to your experience in software development and relevant skills.
A recruiter has been assigned to your profile to coordinate the next steps in the hiring process.
The initial screening interview has been successfully completed, showing strong potential for the software engineer role.
Candidate responded promptly and positively to the screening feedback, expressing eagerness to proceed to technical interviews.
A technical interview has been scheduled for next week to further assess your engineering skills and problem-solving capabilities.
The technical interview was completed with excellent performance in coding challenges and system design questions.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture fit and employment terms.
The HR interview was completed successfully with positive feedback on candidateâ€™s communication and alignment with company values.
An official job offer has been proposed to the candidate, outlining the role, compensation package, and starting date.
